Rancheritos de Boca Restaurant
The Mostdelicious
Latin
flavor
A product of big dreams from a Colombian couple, immigrants in Florida with their 3 month old baby, the first Rancheritos de Boca Restaurant (Restaurante colombiano) opened up their doors in February 2009.
Juan Maya and Viviana Molina saw their dreams come true, by offering traditional Colombian and Latin dishes in Florida, reminding people of their roots, traditions, and Colombian culture. This one-of-a-kind couple from Antioquia, Colombia, poured their passion into replicating traditional recipes from many different regions of Colombia, always homage attention to the recipes handed down by their mothers and grandmothers; Mojarra from the Atlantic Coast, chicken Sancocho, Tamales from the Valle del Cauca, Ajiaco, Fish viudo, Bandeja Paisa, empanadas, an array of Antioquia soups, and many other typical Latin American dishes which can be enjoyed from Monday to Sunday in the most exquisite ways and amongst friends.
It’s been 16 years since their dreams came true! 3 restaurants have now opened their doors: 2 in Boca Raton (February 2009, November 2017), and 1 in Boynton Beach (2019). All the locations offer an atmosphere that will transport you to childhood memories. The flavor, the aromas, and the small decorative details remind us that we still are part of this beautiful culture.
Our dream is kept alive by our clients! The joy they experience every time they walk through our doors. Allowing them to feel just a little bit closer to their roots no matter the distance where They can share our special place with their friends, and family, and taste the special flavors of Colombia with the best ambiance and service we can offer.
Latin
flavor

Discover
Tradicional
Dishes
We are a restaurant that offers the best traditional Colombian food, as a tribute to our Colombian culture. We are a restaurant with a Colombian gastronomy concept with the widest variety of dishes in Miami. At Rancheritos de Boca Restaurant we offer the most delicious Latin flavors.
